message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a product for $100. I've sold 1 out of 1 product so far, and 0 of them have been high-quality. I'm not sure what this product is, but I'm hoping you'll take a chance on it. What do you say? Will you buy it?
I'm taking a chance on this product. Here's my payment of $100.
